mapper.select: select * from empAttendance where vacation_status is not null and vacation_approval = '승인'
mapper.insert: insert into empAttendance (user_no, vacation_status, vacation_reason, vacation_start, vacation_end, vacation_approval,v_name) values(#{user_no}, #{vacation_status}, #{vacation_reason}, #{vacation_start}, #{vacation_end}, '미승인',#{v_name})
mapper.select: select e.user_no, name, job, job_rank, vacation_status, vacation_start, vacation_end, vacation_reason, empAttend_no from employee e join empAttendance v on e.user_no = v.user_no where vacation_status is not null and vacation_approval = '미승인'

select e.user_no, name, job, job_rank, vacation_status, vacation_start, vacation_end, vacation_reason from employee e join empAttendance v on e.user_no = v.user_no where vacation_status is not null and vacation_approval = '승인' AND vacation_start >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-01-01') limit #{pageStart},#{pageSize}

select count(e.user_no) from employee e join empAttendance v on e.user_no = v.user_no where vacation_status is not null and vacation_approval = '승인' AND vacation_start >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-01-01')

select e.user_no, name, job, job_rank, vacation_status, vacation_start, vacation_end, vacation_reason, reject_reason from employee e join empAttendance v on e.user_no = v.user_no where vacation_status is not null and vacation_approval = '반려' AND vacation_start >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-01-01')

select e.user_no, name, job, job_rank, vacation_status, vacation_start, vacation_end, vacation_reason, empAttend_no from employee e join empAttendance v on e.user_no = v.user_no where e.job=#{job} and vacation_status is not null and vacation_approval = '미승인'
